He was a member of the group.
One day, he was shown the biographies of senior monks that he had written.
He had his hand searched for the beginning and end.
He only saw great ability.
He hadn't been able to finish it because of the paper and the ink.

source_sentence: 若迺至法既被名德已興。
translation: If he had only arrived, then the Dharma would have been known and virtue would have flourished.
It took nearly 500 years and six generations to complete it.
From the time Mātaṅgālī Phārāma set out for the western regions.
Anhou Zhiji Kun was trained in the eastern capital.
Though their traces are marked out and absent, their practice is really deep and shallow.
They all made boats and beams that were of great benefit.

source_sentence: 固宜緇素傳美鉛槧定辭照示後昆揄揚往秀。
translation: It's appropriate for them to transmit the beauty of the black and white garlands, set forth a set of words, and reveal to subsequent generations that they've been praised and shown to others.
However, Dao'an and Luosh occasionally submitted a Qin document.
Focheng Daojin jiaowen zhao shan.

source_sentence: 幽明不無梗概泛顯傍文未足光闡。
